name: Juri The Player
description:
This is a mini adventure game. His name is Juri and he is currently on level 1.

Try to finish the game in as little time as possible. It's not that easy how it looks.

All controls are described in game.

Write feedback if you like it or not  or if you would like to see something new in game or change something.

ALSO THERE IS NO MUSIC OR MUSIC EFFECTS FOR NOW, but there will be in the next updates...

GL HF
